comment: You can wake up tomorrow in any reality . You've already written it or dreamed it . Which one would it be ?
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (w / wake-up-02
                  :ARG1 (y / you)
                  :time (t / tomorrow)

                  :time (a2 / already))
            :op2 (d / dream-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 ii))
      :snt3 (a3 / amr-unknown
